1111000101001010 0111100100010010 1 -> sum: 0110101001011101, cout: 1
0000110001001010 0001000100010111 0 -> sum: 0001110101100001, cout: 0
0110111111010001 0001110110110010 1 -> sum: 1000110110000100, cout: 0
0000000010101100 1011101010000110 0 -> sum: 1011101100110010, cout: 0
1000000000010000 0001110110111011 0 -> sum: 1001110111001011, cout: 0
0100111011100110 0000101101101000 1 -> sum: 0101101001001111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
